sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Using the NeedIt Form

Use the NeedIt application to request services and goods from several departments.

  • Legal
  • Human Resources
  • Facilities

NeedIt Form Fields

  1. For new NeedIt records, the Requested for field is pre-populated with your name. If you are opening a NeedIt request for someone else, you can change the value in the Requested for field.
  2. The Requested for email field is automatically populated if you change the user in the Requested for field. You can change the Requested for email field value.The choices in the What needed field depend on the value in the Request type field.
  3. ServiceNow® Dashboards enable you to display multiple Performance Analytics, reporting, and other widgets on a single screen. Use dashboards to create a story with data you can share with multiple users.
  4. If the value in the What needed field is Other, the Other field appears. Use the Other field to add a few words about your request.
  5. Use the calendar picker in the When needed field to set the due date for the NeedIt request.
  6. Use the Short description and Description fields to provide more information about your request.
    Note: When creating NeedIt requests, the When needed date cannot be today or in the past

    Need More Help?

    You can learn about form fields on the ServiceNow docs site.

Administering the NeedIt Form

Only members of the NeedIt application team can make changes to the NeedIt form. Do not make changes to the NeedIt form without an approved change request.

Note: The NeedIt application is brought to you by npm

 

The Dashboards list shows the dashboards in your instance. The following columns are important:
  • Group — The dashboard group that this dashboard belongs to. The dashboards are sorted in the dashboard picker by these groups.
  • Active — Indicates if a dashboard is active in your instance. If false, the dashboard is unavailable.
Note: The columns Visible to, Groups, Users, and Requires Roles only apply to non-responsive dashboards. The values in these columns do not apply to responsive dashboards.

Click New to create a new dashboard.
sys_embedded_help_content.name: NeedIt Form - User
